description: drawn image on yellowed paper; female figures in a landscape setting; seated figure in center with a floral necklace and draping garments; kneeling figure on left extends outstretched arms over seated figure; two semi-nude figures in background on right side; tree on left side; small hills dot the background on right and left edges; paper adhered to mat on top right and left edges
provenance: The artist; by descent to Thea Tenenbaum-Malferrari, Longmont, Colo.; given to MIA, 2017
title: Untitled
